title: Spatio-Temporal Gap Analysis of OBIS-SEAMAP Project Data
summary: This blog post discusses a spatio-temporal gap analysis of OBIS-SEAMAP project data, focusing on marine mammal, seabird, and sea turtle observations. It highlights the importance of identifying gaps in data holdings to prioritize future surveys and research.
usefulness_reason: Score 65 assigned because the post directly mentions "Spatio-Temporal Gap Analysis" and deals with "survey data" in the context of ecological observations. While not explicitly about point processes, the spatio-temporal aspect and survey data relevance are strong.
